data.title: Deisre and Its Shadow
data.meta_description: Soledad awakes to find herself invisible, standing in the middle of Mexico City. Prisoner of her passions -- to change identity, to be the object of someone's desire, to disappear -- she always ends up with her wishes coming true, alonside with their unknown side. The blind can see, ghoststalk to those who listen, and ancient and modern shadows meld together
